title: Cabot Cliffs in Nova Scotia
headline: Cabot Cliffs in Nova Scotia
description: Nova Scotia's Cabot Cliffs, the Ben Crenshaw and Bill Coore designed encore to its sister course Cabot Links, opens this week on Cape Breton Island. Check out the stunning, oceanside course that combines with Cabot Links to create a golf destination rivaled by few others around the world.
body: Nova Scotia's Cabot Cliffs, the Ben Crenshaw and Bill Coore designed encore to its sister course Cabot Links, opens this week on Cape Breton Island. Check out the stunning, oceanside course that combines with Cabot Links to create a golf destination rivaled by few others around the world.
